description: Our gluten free crackers are quick, easy to make and totally irresistible. One bowl and a handful of ingredients are all you need! We chose a falafel spices for our flavor profile. Which one would you use?
keywords: homemade crackers, gluten free crackers, cracker recipe
name: Falafel Flavored Gluten Free Crackers
recipeIngredient: 1 cup of garbanzo bean flour (here we used Bob's Red Mill ) (See Note 1)
1 tsp sea salt or 1/2 tsp table salt
2 tbsp plant-based milk (or water if not available)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the flour and spices in a large bowl and mix well. Add the olive oil, water and milk and knead to form a soft dough (it's best to use clean hand to bring mix the dough)
Roll the dough between two pieces of lightly floured parchment paper, into a rectangle-ish shape, about 1/8 inch thick
Score it into small rectangles (1"x1") using a pizza cutter or a sharp knife and prick each rectangle with a fork
Carefully transfer it to a baking sheet and bake at 375F for 15 minutes
